ca.uhn.hl7v2

Class AbstractHL7Exception

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • ca.uhn.hl7v2.AbstractHL7Exception
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HL7Exception, ValidationException

    public abstract class AbstractHL7Exception
extends Exception
    Abstract base class for Exceptions that are able to create acknowledgement messages from their error code and location information
    Author:
    Christian Ohr
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • populateResponse

        public Message populateResponse(Message emptyResponse,
                                AcknowledgmentCode acknowledgmentCode,
                                int repetition)
                         throws HL7Exception
        Populates the generated response based on this exception.
        Parameters:
        emptyResponse - empty response message
        acknowledgmentCode - the acknowledgement code
        Returns:
        response message
        Throws:
        HL7Exception - if populating the response fails
